Accepted Payment Types:
We accept all major credit and debit cards securely through PayPal, or you can use your PayPal account. Our PayPal account is a verified business account, so you do not have to have a PayPal account to make payments!

24x7x365 Tech Support:
We offer 24x7 support to our clients via email, live chat, forum (for issues that are not urgent), or our client area for issues that are urgent. Our usual response time is under 4 hours!

Questions:
If you have any problems at anytime, please feel free to contact us

If you have read our post, you must be looking for a new host, your search has now ended! We thank you for taking the time to view our specials, and we wish you the best of luck in your hosting search!
